What the Offender did?: Blatant RDM, Lied about what happened.
         He shot a traitor, jumped off the tower into the water and climbed back up. He then ran at me with a knife. So, knowing that he wasn't traitor (because i was), i didnt shoot. He then knifed me and ran away without checking my body. Then said in global chat "not rdm" and climbed up and checked my body. after the round he said i saw your knife. But i didnt have a knife at all. that round all i bought was a betryal and a radar. He RDM's all the time and gets away with it. im pretty sure he killed other innos aswell.
